productDefinition.content: ImageCircleMaker is a free online circular avatar cropping tool designed for social media users. We are committed to providing users with simple, efficient, and professional circular avatar creation experience, allowing everyone to easily create perfect circular avatars that meet the needs of various social media platforms.

0.question: Will my images be uploaded to the server?
0.answer: No. ImageCircleMaker uses local processing technology. All images are processed in your browser and will not be uploaded to any server, completely protecting your privacy and security.

1.question: What image formats are supported?
1.answer: We support mainstream image formats such as JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF. It's recommended to use high-definition images for the best results.

2.question: Can I customize avatar sizes?
2.answer: Yes. In addition to 20+ platform preset sizes, we also support custom size functions to meet your special requirements.

3.question: What export formats are supported?
3.answer: Support PNG, JPG, WebP three formats. PNG supports transparent background, JPG files are smaller, WebP combines quality and file size advantages.

4.question: How to choose the right avatar size?
4.answer: Different platforms have different requirements for avatar sizes. We provide detailed platform size descriptions, and you can choose the appropriate size according to your target platform.

5.question: Can I undo operations during editing?
5.answer: Yes. We provide complete undo/redo functions, and you can adjust editing operations at any time.

6.question: Do you support batch image processing?
6.answer: Currently supports single image processing. We are developing batch processing functions, please stay tuned.

7.question: What should I do if I encounter problems during use?
7.answer: You can check our usage tutorial, or get technical support through the contact page. We will reply to your questions within 24 hours.

8.question: What's the difference between circular and square avatars?
8.answer: Circular avatars are visually softer and more friendly, suitable for most social media platforms. Our tool specifically optimizes the cropping algorithm for circular avatars to ensure the best display effects.

cta.title: Start Creating Your Circular Avatar Now
cta.subtitle: No registration required, free to use, privacy protected, quickly create professional circular avatars

content.0: ImageCircleMaker is a free online circular avatar cropping tool designed for social media users. Whether you need to create professional circular avatars for Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, TikTok and other platforms, we can provide you with perfect solutions.
content.1: Our tool uses advanced local processing technology to ensure your image privacy and security. All image processing is completed in your browser and will not be uploaded to any server. At the same time, we support multiple image formats and export options, allowing you to easily create high-quality circular avatars that meet the needs of various social media platforms.
content.2: As a professional circular avatar creation tool, ImageCircleMaker provides rich editing functions, including intelligent cropping, filter effects, border decoration, etc. Our platform size library covers 20+ international mainstream social platforms, ensuring your circular avatars can be perfectly displayed on various platforms.
content.3: Whether you are an individual user, enterprise user, or content creator, ImageCircleMaker can meet your needs. Our tool is completely free to use, no registration required, ready to use, allowing you to quickly create professional-level circular avatars and enhance your social media presence.

about.title: About ImageCircleMaker
about.subtitle: A dynamic and innovative team, long-term focused on creating user-satisfying products

content.0: ImageCircleMaker was born in 2024, founded by a group of passionate young developers. We noticed the challenges social media users face when creating circular avatarsâ€”either needing to download complex software, pay for online tools, or worry about privacy and security issues.
content.1: Based on these pain points, we decided to create a completely free, privacy-secure, and powerful online circular avatar creation tool. Our team brings together professionals from frontend development, UI/UX design, product management, and other fields, each passionate about creating excellent product experiences.
content.2: From the initial concept to the current product, we have always adhered to the user-first philosophy, continuously iterating and optimizing, just to provide users with the best experience. We believe that good products should be simple to use, powerful, and completely free.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how ImageCircleMaker protects your privacy and data security

collection.title: 1. Information Collection
collection.description: ImageCircleMaker is committed to protecting your privacy. The information we collect includes:

items.0: Usage Data: How you use our services, including feature usage and performance data
items.1: Technical Information: Browser type, operating system, IP address, etc.
items.2: Image Data: Your uploaded images are processed locally only and will not be uploaded to our servers

usage.title: 2. Information Usage
usage.description: We use the collected information for:

items.1: Analyzing usage patterns to optimize user experience
items.2: Detecting and preventing fraud or abuse

protection.title: 3. Data Protection
protection.description: We take the following measures to protect your data:

items.0: Local Processing: Your images are processed locally in your browser and will not be uploaded to servers
items.1: Encrypted Transmission: All data transmission is encrypted using HTTPS
items.2: Secure Storage: Server data is protected using industry-standard security measures
items.3: Access Control: Strict restrictions on access to personal data

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information unless:

items.1: Required by law or government agencies
items.2: To protect our rights, property, or safety

cookies.title: 5. Cookie Usage
cookies.note: You can disable cookies through browser settings, but this may affect the use of certain features.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.description: Under applicable law, you have the right to:

items.0: Access personal information we hold about you
items.2: Request deletion of your personal information
items.3: Object to processing of your personal information

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or need to exercise your rights, please contact us through:
contact.responseTimeValue: We will respond within 30 days of receiving your request

updates.title: 8. Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Major changes will be notified to you through website notifications or email. We recommend that you regularly review this policy to understand how we protect your information.
